txt.en: 'The horse from Combe looks restless and needs to be taken out for a daily run. Could you go check on him?'

The horse paws at the ground and looks anxious to be free of his stall, and out running free...\n\n'<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This quest begins a special session quest. You will be logged out of your normal character and take on the guise of a player-friendly npc. You will not be able to leave the region the character starts in, as this character and will attain a set of skills unique to this special player character.</rgb>'
The Horse from Combe followed you here, and seems pretty content to stay here for the time being...
Check on the Horse from Combe
The Horse from Combe is on the far side of the horse farm's main stable area from Ã‰ogar.
